text: The Goalkeeper () is a 1936 Soviet musical comedy movie directed by Semyon Timoshenko.Вратарь It stars Grigory Pluzhnik, Tatyana Guretskaya, and Lyudmila Glazova. == Actors == * Grigory Pluzhnik as Anton Kandidov * Tatyana Guretskaya as Grusha * Lyudmila Glazova as Nastya, lab technician * Anatoliy Goryunov as Karasik, an engineer * Valeri Solovtsov as Bukhvostov * Yakov Gudkin as Foma == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1936 comedy movies Category:1936 musical movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian musical movies Category:Movies directed by Semyon Timoshenko
title: The Goalkeeper (1936 movie)
